Then this game is right for you
i love the chickens in this game

ya yeet is good buy premium tho

this game is one of these games that you say i hate it i wont play it anymore .. u close it and after 30 mnits u relise that there nothing better than this even with hacker and russain this game have diffrent taste i love it..

Good game (If you play faceit, esea, esportal, ecl! Basically anything that is NOT made by valve)
The best fps on the market if you dedicate time and practice to it.
Прикольная игра, если не слушать голосовой чат. Эта игра научила меня большему количеству языков, нежели школа.

Just as good as the first day, its difficult to get used to play this game , it isn´t the same as other shooters. Very funny playing with friends and competitive matches :D.
